title: Ideal Property for Holiday Home in Kandy.
details: A two storied comfortable luxurious 6 bed roomed (En-Suite) house with a large veranda and a floor area of approx. 5,600 sq. ft. on a 540 perch block of land, with an additional house with a floor area of about 1,100 sq, ft., in Galaha, in the Kandy district, where the availability of such an extent of land, is truly an asset, is available for sale. The property is under a hours drive from the Kandy City Center car Park passing the Kandy General Hospital.
